Welcome to the Fluency Fun Web App

Increase your Hebrew reading fluency with this fun web app which allows you to practice reading Hebrew texts with support. Want to check your pronunciation? Listen to it read aloud, word-for-word, so you can learn to read with confidence!

Directions: The key to your success is the repeated reading, so choose a text and read the first word. When you are confident with your reading, then add another word and read from the beginning. Continue this until you are a Hebrew reading rockstar!
